title: Jacket, from a three-piece set
description: pounded indigo; black with pink, orange, blue, red; front opening edged with pink embroidered band; large embroidered squares of blue and orange on chest and sleeves in front; large square of embroidered blue, red, orange and green edged in red and white bands in back; white sleeve gussets; white squares end the embroidered band; PL band longer than PR band; all hand sewn
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
